DOC.brief_summary: Study title - A randomized , open label , multicenter , phase 4 study comparison efficacy tiotropium plus salmeterol/ fluticasone propionate compare tiotropium alone COPD patient Study objectives - To investigate clinical outcome combine tiotropium fluticasone propionate/salmeterol ( FSC ) 250/50Î¼g bid compare tiotropium alone patient moderate severe COPD Korea Study Design - Randomized , open-label , multicenter , parallel-group , two group study Study assessment - FEV1 - Inspiratory capacity ( IC ) - History COPD exacerbation - History hospitalization COPD exacerbation cause - QoL ( SGRQ-C )
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes Tiotropium Plus Fluticasone Propionate/Salmeterol Compared With Tiotropium Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Korea
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Subjects Aged 40 80 year . Subjects diagnose COPD . Tobacco smoke 10 packyears . Subjects postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.7 FEV1 < 65 % predict . Subjects history physiciandiagnosed asthma respiratory disorder COPD clinically significant diffuse bilateral bronchiectasis . Subjects suffer serious disease likely interfere study chronic congestive heart failure . Subjects use systemic corticosteroid within 4 week prior study entry . Subjects malignant disease . Subjects history severe glaucoma , urinary tract obstruction . Previous lung volume reduction surgery . Subjects pregnant breastfeeding . Subjects know hypersensitivity intolerance tiotropium fluticasonesalmeterol .
